titles: The Londoners petition To the Right Honorable the Lords and Commons novv assembled in the high court of Parliament. The humble petition of divers inhabitants of the City of London and the liberties thereof.
notes: Praying Parliament to "speedily tender his Majesty propositions for accomodation."
Annotation on Thomason copy: "frivolous petition [illegible] ye 14th"; "Decemb: 23."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
